Firstly, this technique requires the use of the [[Genjutsu: Sharingan]]. The opponent is caught in the illusionary world created by the user, and the victim is tormented with the sensation of having spikes driven through them, taking away their body's freedom. At the same time, the physical pain accompanying the illusion reveals that the greatest use this technique has is torture.

== Trivia ==
* [[Orochimaru]] described this technique as a type of {{translation|"''Temporary Paralysis Genjutsu''"|金縛りの幻術|Kanashibari no Genjutsu|Temporary Paralysis Illusion Technique}}.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 345, page 8</ref>
